segments.text: What are you doing there on the computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come have a look , I received many beautiful e-cards . They are from my friends , all over the world . Christmas wishes for all my friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's pretty interesting . Did you get one from Haven ? The reason I ask is that I am looking for her number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I don't have it . But I do have her Email . You want me to sent it to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , that would be great . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No worries . I just for her card . And you can get her from Email . I would really like to talk to her again . I kind of miss her a little this days .
segments.speaker: S2
